name: Two Rooms (itch) (梚辰)
description:
Two Rooms is a two-player interactive puzzle-solving game, where the two players respectively play Nancy and Sikes, who are trapped in a pyramid during a trip to explore ancient Egypt. The players are trapped in two seemingly different but closely related secret rooms. Only by working together can they solve the numerous puzzles and escape alive.

Features
  • Two-Player Puzzle-Solving Experience

You and a friend will be assigned to adjacent rooms, connected by interlocking puzzles and intertwined information. Work together to crack them all and escape the pyramid!

  • Interactive Puzzles

Designed with two-player interactions in mind, the puzzles require not only information exchange, but also coordinated operations. Using your synergy, explore the commonalities of the two rooms and overcome the difficulties together!

  • Mythological Elements

Set against the backdrop of an ancient Egyptian pyramid, the puzzles incorporate elements of Egyptian mythology. Understanding related information may help you solve the puzzles faster, and the game will also introduce you to the beauty of Egyptian culture.

  • Replayability

The full game process takes 15-20 minutes, and to get the complete game experience, we recommend exchanging perspectives and playing through the process again. We have also added randomized puzzle elements to the game, providing a unique experience each time you play. Additionally, the game will display the fastest five groups of players to complete the game, so come and challenge yourself if you want to be showcased!
